translations: n.买主独家垄断，买方垄断

phrs.translation: 买方垄断, 买者垄断, 一个“买方”的垄断
买方垄断的无谓损失, 买方垄断白勺无谓损失
买方垄断力, 市场力, 买方垄断势力

sentences.sentence: This paper studies the employment effect of minimum wages in the monopsony labor market.
sentences.translation: 文章探讨了劳动力市场买方垄断条件下最低工资对就业的影响。

sentences.sentence: Some economists argue this makes no sense, despite the fear of a loss of pricing power to a Chinese monopsony.
sentences.translation: 一些经济学家认为，尽管担心在中国买家垄断下丧失定价权，这么做也毫无意义。

sentences.sentence: As with any monopsony — one buyer, many sellers — the sellers are going to have their prices dictated by the buyer.
sentences.translation: 任何意义上的垄断—一个买家，许多卖家——结果都是：卖家不得不让买家来确定价格。
